subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Game 2 of an American League division series in 2007, when midges distracted Joba Chamberlain in an Indians victory over the Yankees, is still a point of interest in Cleveland.
snippet: Game 2 of an American League division series in 2007, when midges distracted Joba Chamberlain in an Indians victory over the Yankees, is still a point of interest in Cleveland.
